body_html: It should just be in core/kernels/scatter_nd_op.cc. You should run the same TF_CALL macro for all types as in the CPU version, but instead register the GPU ones, if that makes sense. If you have repro instructions on how to test I could give it a shot on my end.
body_text: It should just be in core/kernels/scatter_nd_op.cc. You should run the same TF_CALL macro for all types as in the CPU version, but instead register the GPU ones, if that makes sense. If you have repro instructions on how to test I could give it a shot on my end.
body: It should just be in core/kernels/scatter_nd_op.cc. You should run the same `TF_CALL` macro for all types as in the CPU version, but instead register the GPU ones, if that makes sense. If you have repro instructions on how to test I could give it a shot on my end.
